Exception.NoOperandsAndVariables: Input string doesn't contain any variables or operands
Exception.OperationBeforeRBracket: Operation before right bracket at position
Exception.BracketsNumberIsNotEqual: Left brackets number is not equal that right brackets number
Exception.NoOperandAfterInversion: No operand after inversion at position
Exception.LastSymbolIsInversion: Last symbol in string is inversion
Exception.SequenceOfVariablesIsBroken: The sequence of variables is broken
Exception.IncorrectOperationChanging: Can't read all variables because of incorrect operation changing
